description: The perfect layer for high output activities, from alpine approaches, backcountry tours or mountain runs that require added protection, the Coefficient LT Hybrid Hoody is a stretchier, lighter version of their popular Coefficient fleece with added insulation. The Primaloft insulated, breathable, woven front panel provides warmth against the elements while the Polartec® Power Grid® fleece with a gridded interior increases wicking performance and adds breathability. A zippered chest pocket stores your phone or other essentials, while maintaining a minimal pro le that is slim cut for ease of layering.
name: Coefficient LT Hybrid Hoody - Womens

specs.value: Polartec Powergrid polyester stretch grid back fleece - 90% Polyester, 10% Elastane, 119 g
Nylon light weight stretch woven - 100% Nylon, 44 g
Primaloft Silver Breathable Insulation - 100% Polyester, 40 g
